mapper.sql: article_id, title, describtion, subtime, viewed, shared, greated, sts, suber, b_1, b_2, b_3
mapper.insert:
insert into article
article_id,
title,
describtion,
subtime,
viewed,
shared,
greated,
sts,
suber,
b_1,
b_2,
b_3,
content,

#{subtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update article
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
describtion = #{describtion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subtime = #{subtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
viewed = #{viewed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shared = #{shared,jdbcType=INTEGER},
greated = #{greated,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sts = #{sts,jdbcType=TINYINT},
suber = #{suber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
b_1 = #{b1,jdbcType=CHAR},
b_2 = #{b2,jdbcType=CHAR},
b_3 = #{b3,jdbcType=CHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update article set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describtion = #{describtion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtime = #{subtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, viewed = #{viewed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shared = #{shared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, greated = #{greated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sts = #{sts,jdbcType=TINYINT}, suber = #{suber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, b_1 = #{b1,jdbcType=CHAR}, b_2 = #{b2,jdbcType=CHAR}, b_3 = #{b3,jdbcType=CHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update article set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describtion = #{describtion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtime = #{subtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, viewed = #{viewed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shared = #{shared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, greated = #{greated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sts = #{sts,jdbcType=TINYINT}, suber = #{suber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, b_1 = #{b1,jdbcType=CHAR}, b_2 = #{b2,jdbcType=CHAR}, b_3 = #{b3,jdbcType=CHAR} where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
